articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Android apps are blocking sideloading and forcing Google Play versions instead - Ars Technica
articles.description: "Select Play Partners" can block unofficial installation of their apps.
articles.content: Enlarge/ It's never explained what this collection of app icons quite represents. A disorganized app you tossed together by sideloading? A face that's frowning because it's rolling down a bar held up… [+3002 chars]
